params.instruction_str: Read the story and decide if each sentence is correct or incorrect.

params.instruct_panel_str: If you are unsure about how the animation above works click the "Instructions" button for help

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.start_text: He didn't have <u>many</u> money to spend, so he stayed at the beach most of the time.
question.correct_text: He didn't have much money to spend, so he stayed at the beach most of the time.
question.modelAnswerString: He didn't have much money to spend, so he stayed at the beach most of the time.

question.start_text: He didn't expect to do <u>many</u> sightseeing at all.
question.correct_text: He didn't expect to do much sightseeing at all.
question.modelAnswerString: He didn't expect to do much sightseeing at all.

question.start_text: In fact, because he spoke <u>little</u> Greek, Mario was worried that it would be hard for him to talk to the local people.
question.correct_text: In fact, because he spoke little Greek, Mario was worried that it would be hard for him to talk to the local people.
question.modelAnswerString:
In fact, because he spoke little Greek, Mario was worried that it would be hard for him to talk to the local people.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: However, he was surprised to find that <u>many</u> people could speak English quite well.
question.modelAnswerString:
However, he was surprised to find that many people could speak English quite well.
No change was necessary.
question.correct_text: However, he was surprised to find that many people could speak English quite well.

question.start_text: As Mario's English was very good, he had <u>little</u> difficulty communicating.
question.correct_text: As Mario's English was very good, he had little difficulty communicating.
question.modelAnswerString:
As Mario's English was very good, he had little difficulty communicating.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: What's more, <u>a few</u> of the staff at the hotel spoke excellent Italian and he became good friends with them.
question.correct_text: What's more, a few of the staff at the hotel spoke excellent Italian and he became good friends with them.
question.modelAnswerString:
What's more, a few of the staff at the hotel spoke excellent Italian and he became good friends with them.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: They even showed Mario around the island, so he was able to visit <u>plenty of</u> places after all.
question.correct_text: They even showed Mario around the island, so he was able to visit plenty of places after all.
question.modelAnswerString:
They even showed Mario around the island, so he was able to visit plenty of places after all.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: He didn't like the town centre because there was <u>much</u> noise.
question.correct_text: He didn't like the town centre because there was a lot of noise.
question.modelAnswerString: He didn't like the town centre because there was a lot of noise.

question.start_text: He preferred to go to quiet places where there weren't <u>lot of</u> people.
question.correct_text: He preferred to go to quiet places where there weren't a lot of people.
question.modelAnswerString:
He preferred to go to quiet places where there weren't a lot of people.
No change was necessary.

question.start_text: Although he was there only <u>a few</u> days, he enjoyed his holiday very much.
question.correct_text: Although he was there only a few days, he enjoyed his holiday very much.
question.modelAnswerString:
Although he was there only a few days, he enjoyed his holiday very much.
No change was necessary.
